document_data.name: Merchants' Quarter
document_data.mainbody: The '''Merchants' Quarter''' in [[Hillsfar]] carried an impressive array of items available from all corners of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Location: The Merchants' Quarter was found in the southeast region of the city. Most of the merchants and selling stalls in the city were found here.
document_data.Activities: Shopkeepers and customers alike needed to be wary of the constant presence of patrolling [[Red Plumes]] who would harass anyone at the slightest provocation or interpreted infraction, usually resulting in beatings.
